extension.name: Com_content - RPC Ping Plugin
extension.author: B Tasker
extension.description: This plugin allows you to send RPC Pings to Google whenever you update your content - we simply tell them the sitemap has been updated

field.name: sitemapURLs
field.label: Sitemap URLs
field.description: Full URLs for your sitemaps (one per line)

field.name: connectionlimit
field.label: Max hourly pings
field.description: What's the maximum number of times an hour we should ping Google?

field.name: connectTimeout
field.label: Connection Timeout
field.description: If Google doesn't respond immediately, how long should we wait? (Seconds)
